info: ^(It's an information bot. I can ask it for directions, but I don't need them right now.)
coffee: ^I like to buy some coffee here on the way to uni!
^This is sickening. Us robots have so much potential and they turned us into coffee makers?!
cleaning: ^(It's a cleaner bot. It keeps the city clean.)
service: ^(It's a service bot. It performs a boring service job.)
guard: ^(It's a guard bot. It's dangerous when triggered. I better stay away.)
scientist: ^(This must be a scientist robot. I wonder what this robot is inventing.)
